Name Variants: In this column place name variants your institution is known by
Domains: In this column put all domain names that your institution owns or operates under, as may appear in URLs or email addresses
Grant Numbers: In this column place the grant numbers of any grants you wish to receive content for
Dummy1: This column is left empty for the time being
Institution IDs: In this column all institutional IDs (e.g. ROR) may appear whether these pieces of information will ever be delivered with articles' metadata or not
Keywords: In this column place keywords - if applicable at all - of a non-institutional repository on behalf you wish to receive content for

Name Variants: In order to use this template, please remove all content except the headers in row 1, and then complete the columns for each type.  You do not have to complete all of the columns if you do not wish to.  You can have as many or as few entries in each column as you like.
When exporting this CSV from your spreadsheet program, please ensure that you save it as a CSV with text encoding “UTF-8”
